message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm going for a 60-40 split in my favor. Since I'm the one proposing now, I figure it's only fair. If you accept, we can both get something. If not, we'll see how it plays out.
You tried 60-40, now it's my turn. Considering the inflation, you should be more willing to compromise.
Alright, I'm willing to compromise again. Let's go back to a 60-40 split in your favor. We both know the value of the money is dropping, so let's end this before it gets any worse.
